generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the grassy area, separated from the road by a curb.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line the right side of the road, featuring brick and other architectural styles.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along both sides of the road, providing greenery and shade.
- terrain: Grass and greenery are present on the left side of the road, forming a landscaped area.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a pickup truck is driving in the middle of the road.
- truck: A pickup truck is visible in the middle of the road, identifiable by its rear cargo bed.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a green directional sign and a yellow sign with text, mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance on the left side of the road.
